Key Match Events: Canada with some good chances. Playing good counter attack football.
The keeper gambled a little too much but honestly had no choice...horrible center back play.
A seemingly broken play leads to a goal.
Pre-Game Insights: The 2024 Copa América will be the 48th edition of the Copa America, which is the international men's soccer championship organized by South America's football ruling body CONMEBOL.
The tournament will be held in the US and is co-organized by CONCACAF.
The US will host the tournament for the second time, and it will be held from June 20, 2024 to July 14, 2024.
The winner will later compete in the 2025 UEFA Cup of Champions against the UEFA Euro 2024 winner.
The futbol kicks off tomorrow with the defending champion Argentina taking on Canada at the Mercedes Benz Stadium - Atlanta, GA.
